author: Mosley
Mal0
description: Fetch and post SS13 changelogs from multiple GitHub folders; compare web vs local cache across a rolling window; includes an interactive per-day menu.
install_msg: Configure sources via 'schangelog set sources add <owner> <repo> <path> [branch]'. Optionally set 'schangelog set cachedays <N>' and visual settings (role/color/footers). Use 'scl [ping] [YYYY-mm-dd|today]', 'schangelog set update [refday]', and 'scl menu [refday]'.
Name: SS13 Changelogs
